item.title: Exploiting PHP Deserialization: CCCamp19 CTF PDFCreator Challenge
item.description: Deserialization is a vulnerability class that’s often overlooked. It’s great that this year’s CCCamp CTF included an interesting web based challenge that is based on this vulnerability class. The Target The challenge includes a link to a web service that allows converting user-supplied images into PDF files. Users can upload image files, add some additional HTML content in a textbox and render the whole thing into a PDF file:
